scripts.testapilocal:
newman run DemoBook.postman_collection.json -e Local.postman_environment.json
		-r junit,cli --reporter-junit-export result-tests-local.xml
scripts.testapiQA:
newman run DemoBook.postman_collection.json -e QA.postman_environment.json -r
		junit,cli --reporter-junit-export result-tests-qa.xml
